text: Francis P. McCloskey (July 22, 1917 – July 1, 2010) was an American politician who served in the New York State Assembly from 1955 to 1964 and from 1966 to 1970. He died on July 1, 2010, in Frederick, Maryland at age 92. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Members of the New York State Assembly Category:New York (state) Republicans
title: Francis P. McCloskey
